name: SeerDataCruncher
tagline: is a Data Quality Firewall, Data Quality Monitor and ETL middleware to manage data streams on the fly.
body:
### The problem
Millions of data streams are coming in your system and you realized there is too much garbage inside.

### The solution
Instead of cleaning your db when it's too late, why don't you block the bad data before they occur?
SeerDataCruncher is built to do that. Protect the quality of your data in real-time.

### How to use
After Installation, you have to configure and certify the source data, the data type and the values expected using a simple web interface (no technical skill required).  
Like a network firewall, when it's up and running you don't know what is going on in background but with SeerDataCruncher you have an amazing dashboard to manage and view everything.

### Authors
In 2014, [Alfredo Gemma](https://it.linkedin.com/in/alfredo-gemma-7273828/it) and [Mario Altimari](https://uk.linkedin.com/in/altimario) founded foreSEE-Revolution, the parent-company of [see-r.com](http://www.see-r.com), where SeerDataCruncher is applied within our Enterprise edition of SEE-R.  
We decided to offer the community this technology, hoping it will prove useful in the fight against data-corruption.

### Support
Check out our [documentation](https://github.com/see-r/SeerDataCruncher) or [contact support](http://see-r.com/about/contacts/) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
